675060.name: Fantasy Grounds - Millennium Knights (Savage Worlds)
675060.description:
Millenium Knights

It's 1999 and monsters don't exist. Theyre the stuff of legend and myth, right? Wrong. Our world is filled with paranormal creatures just itching to enslave humanity or wipe it off the face of the Earth.
Only the worlds finest agents stand between the paranormal horror and an unsuspecting public. Outfitted with the best technology and tradecraft, it's time to get to work.
Wear the tuxedo, load the Walther PPK, and save the world!
Product Contains: A module with all of the previous material released for Millennium Knights as well the full plot point campaign. Millennium Knights is part of the Suzerain Continuum.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Chris Taylor
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
